snippet: Speaker John A. Boehner said Thursday that he believed Congress and the White House could come up with a comprehensive immigration solution.
abstract: House Speaker John A Boehner says he believes Congress and the White House could come up with a comprehensive immigration solution.
lead_paragraph: Speaker John A. Boehner said Thursday that he believed Congress and the White House could come up with a comprehensive immigration solution.

headline.seo: Boehner ‘Confident’ of Deal With White House on Immigration
headline.main: Speaker ‘Confident’ of Deal With White House on Immigration
headline.print_headline: Speaker ‘Confident’ of Deal With White House on Immigration
